ActTax Court of Canada Act
PrecisAppointment of VERN KRISHNA, C.M., Q.C., of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a member of the Independent Judicial Advisory Committee for the Tax Court of Canada, to hold office during pleasure for a term expiring on June 1, 2019.
